articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: LIVE UPDATES: Germany braces for heavy rains and flooding - DW (English)
articles.description: Experts predict heavy flooding in Central Europe this weekend, with storms affecting Czech Republic, Poland, Austria and Romania. Water levels in Germany's Bavaria also rose but remained moderate. DW has the latest.
articles.content:
Ahead of storms reaching Central Europe, some experts have warned the rainfall could trigger the flood of the century.
 "We have to be ready for the worst case scenarios," Czech Prime Minister Petr … [+1343 chars]
